display_name: Child Health Questionnaire Parent Form 50 Questions: During the past 4 weeks, has your child been limited in any of the following activities due to health problems? Taking care of him/herself, that is, eating, dressing, bathing, or going to the toilet?
description:
Item from the Child Health Questionnaire Parent Form 50 Questions (CHQ-PF50). [Asmussen L et al, 2000 (PubMed ID: 11029320)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11029320/)

[Search for all CHQ-PF50 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/cfs/variables?search=chqpf50)
